page.title: 05Recreation in Kingswood area
page.content: Because of the rural nature of the area, the quantity of recreational amenities in it are few - but the area is quite well served if one is prepared to travel a few miles. Within the area itself there is a full championship size{golf course}which has its own{squash courts.}Kingswood also has its own Tennis club. A new indoor sports complex has recently been built in nearby Redhill, similar facilities are also availiable at Leatherhead. With so many large houses, with large gardens, in the area -{gardening is a popular passtime.{Horse riding}is also popular with many riding schools and stables close by. A great many people also enjoy{walking}and there are many public footpaths around. Cinemas, Night Clubs, Discos etc. are availiable within close reach.
